content.name: Arcane Bolt
content.description: **Casting value of 5** and **range 12"**. If successful at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, can **pick 1** enemy unit within range and visible to caster. That unit suffers **1 mortal wound**. If that unit is within **3"** of caster it suffers **D3 mortal wounds** instead of 1.

content.name: Mystic Shield
content.description: **Casting value of 5** and **range 12"**. If successful **pick 1** friendly unit wholly within range and visible to caster. **Add 1** to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
